pageTitleSingle: Have you applied for any benefits that you are waiting to hear about?
pageTitleJoint: Have you or your partner applied for any benefits that you are waiting to hear about?

waitingToHearAboutBenefits.required: Select yes if you have applied for any benefits that you are waiting to hear about.
waitingToHearAboutBenefits.change: Change whether you have applied for any benefits that you are waiting to hear about

benefitsDetails.label: Benefits have you applied for
benefitsDetails.required: Enter the benefits that you have applied for.
benefitsDetails.length: Benefits that you have applied for must be 500 characters or less.
benefitsDetails.change: Change which benefits you have applied for
